name: uk-regulatory-intelligence-mcp
description: MCP server for tracking UK regulatory intelligence across multiple sectors
long_description: Track UK regulatory publications, parliamentary activity, and compliance changes across social care, education, legal, charities, local government, recruitment, and construction sectors

sectors.title: Sectors to Track
sectors.description:
Comma-separated list of sectors to monitor:

• social-care = CQC, DHSC, care homes
• education = Ofsted, DfE, schools, SEND
• legal = SRA, Law Society, solicitors
• charities = Charity Commission
• local-authority = DLUHC, councils
• recruitment = Employment agencies
• construction = HSE, building safety

Example: social-care,education,legal
